comment: Frau Ward is awesome! The class is easy and she has lots of good ways for English speakers to remember difficult concepts. If you pay attention and do the super easy homework assignments (that take like 15 minutes max) you'll come out of the class knowing a lot more German than you came in with
Frau Ward is really an outstanding German professor. She does everything she possibly can to help her students succeed. Just make sure you pay attention in class and do the homework, easy A!
